attributes.action: Add card readers back onto the New Routemasters
attributes.additional_details: Most of the time, the bus is usually very crowded when trying to walk through the front door, and I believe adding these card readers would speed up time journeys, and overall make the journey smoother
attributes.background: I want the government to add card readers back onto the routemaster buses by all doors

rejection.details: Decisions about this are a matter for Transport for London, not the UK Government or Parliament.
